data.title: Omar Diary of Sultan Ahmad
data.meta_description: Omar Diary of Sultan Ahmad - Free ebook download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This thesis examines the diary of Sultan Ahmad as-Salleh from 1775 to 1795, a historical text that provides insights into politics, economics, and society in Bon√©, South Sulawesi during that period. The diary details important events like the succession of Sultan Ahmad as-Salleh as ruler, rebellions including by I Sangkilang, and conflicts over the regalia of Gowa. It also records information on the local economy such as agriculture, trade, land ownership, and slavery. Additionally, the diary describes social and cultural customs including rites of passage, the royal court, performing arts, leisure activities, and religious practices. The thesis analyzes the diary to understand this period in history
